alert.note: Alert for Bond; Fayette; Montgomery (Illinois) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Saint Louis (Eastern Missouri and West Central Illinois)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 19 at 1:03PM CDT until May 19 at 1:45PM CDT by NWS Saint Louis
info.description: The National Weather Service in St Louis has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northeastern Bond County in south central Illinois... Fayette County in south central Illinois... Southeastern Montgomery County in south central Illinois... * Until 145 PM CDT. * At 103 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Woburn, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * This severe thunderstorm will be near... Mulberry Grove and Van Burensburg around 110 PM CDT. Vandalia around 120 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this severe thunderstorm include Ramsey, Brownstown, St. Elmo and Wrights Corner. This includes Interstate 70 in Illinois between exits 52 and 76. This also includes Ramsey Lake State Park. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
